name: Data-Shapes
description: Tested against Revit 2016-2024 and Dynamo 2.x // UI Nodes now usable in Civil 3D, sandbox and Formit environments as well!!  -- Collection of nodes that aims to enhance the interaction with revit and  UI creation for dynamo scripts . Check out www.data-shapes.io for more informations about the nodes, tutorials and workflows!
contents:
ActiveDocument.FileSize - Gets the file size of the ative document, even if it is a BIM360 Design workshared project., Add Shared Parameter(s) from txt - Add shared parameters to project from SharedParameter .txt file, All Elements In View(s) - Retrieves all visible element in a view or a set of views, All Elements Of Categories in View - Retrieves all elements of the given categories in the given view, All Lines of LineStyle - Gets all lines in a project with a giver LineStyle, BarChart - BarChart, Boolean input - Creates a boolean input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, Categorie(s) by ENU Name(s) - Gets categorie(s) in the current UI language by it's english name, Categories list - Gives list of all Revit categories and a matching list of their names, ColorInput Data - Create a color selection input for UI.MultiInputForm++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos! Warning : Only works with Revit 2017, ConditionalInput Data - Allows to create inputs that are enabled/disabled by a condition dor UI.MultipleInputForm++. , DataTable input - Create a DataTable view input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++, DirectoryPath Data - Creates a DirectoryPath input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, Document.LengthDisplayUnit - Returns diplay units for lengths in current document., DropDown Data - Create data for DropDown input in UI.MultiInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos., Duplicate Element - Duplicates all types of elements including view templates, Element(s) cut - Cutting element(s) with element, Excel.Worksheets - Gets worksheet names from specified Excel workbook., Export to FBX - Exports 3D views to FBX format, Export Views to NavisWorks - exports 3d views to NavisWorks, FilePath Data - Create filepath input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos !, Filter.IsApplied - Returns a boolean values indicating wether a ParameterFilterElement is applied to any view in the project or not. , Geometry.PruneDuplicates - Removes all duplicate geometries from list., Get All Linked Docs infos - Get all linked documents names and paths, GetAllElementsFromLinks++ - Get all elements of category or type from given documents , GetLinkedElement.InHostView - Gets linked elements in host view(s)., GetLinkedElement.InHostViewAndCategory - Gets linked elements in host view, filtered by category., Grid.SetVerticalExtents - Set the vertical extents of all project grids, Image Data - Places an image on UI.MultipleInutForm ++ ., ImportInstance.IsLinked - Returns boolean info indicating wether an ImportInstance is linked or not (meaning it's imported)., InputGroup Data - Creates a group of inputs for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos !, Line LineStyle - Gives LineStyle name and element of Lines, LineChart - LineChart, Listview Data - Create data for ListView input in UI.MultiInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos., ModificationTracker.AllChanges - Takes ExistingElements Data as input and outputs lists with all geometry/parameter values change combinations . Check out www.Data-Shapes.net for more informations ., ModificationTracker.GeometryChanges - Takes ExistingElements Data as input and outputs elements with same geometry and elements with changed geometry . Check out www.Data-Shapes.net for more infos, ModificationTracker.ModelComparison - Compares elements from documents A and B (A is the current document by default) and returns existing elements data, new elements, deleted elements and a report. Check out www.Data-Shapes.net for more infos. , ModificationTracker.ParameterChanges - takes ExistingElements Data as input and outputs elements with same parameter values and elements with changed parameter values. Check out www.Data-Shapes.net for more infos., MultiLanguage IO - Takes inputs in different languages and returns the version that corresponds to the active Revit application language settings., MultiLineTextBox Data - Creates a multi line textbox input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++, MultipleInputForm ++ - Create a form with multiple inputs. 
see www.data-shapes.net for tutorials and infos!, Number to Rounded String  - Returns rounded number to specified number of decimals as string, ParameterGroup list - List of all parameter groups, PerformanceAdviserRule Elements - Gets all elements relative to a performance adviser rule. , PerspectiveView.ByEyePositionTarget - Create perspective view , PieChart - PieChart, PointChart - PointChart, RadioButtons Data - Create radio buttons input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . , RayBounce On Link Category - Same functionality as raybounce but takes linked model elements into account, RayBounce On Linked Model - Same functionality as raybounce but takes linked model elements into account, Replace viewports by center - Replaces vieports on sheets according to list of points. (0,0) is bottom left of sheets, Room Status - Sorts a list of room into three categories: unplaced, PlacedAndBounded and  unbounded, Room.Height - Returns room height., Room_Group_Outline - Returns the outline of the inpu rooms, grouped by the value of the "Grouping Parameter", Select Face (s) (PickObject) - Same as OOTB Select Faces, but can be used through Dynamo Player, Select Model Elements of Category - Allows to perform a manual selection with a category filter., SelectAutoCadObjects_Data - This input can be used in Civil 3D or in Autocad for object selection! , SelectEdges Data - Creates a Revit edge selection input for UI.MultipleInputForm++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos! , SelectFaces Data - Creates a Revit face selection input for UI.MultipleInputForm++. Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, SelectLinkedElement(s) Data - Create a button input for UI.MultipleInputForm++ that allows to select elements in Ã  linked document. See www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, SelectModelElements Data (ordered) - Creates a Revit element selection input for UI.MultipleInputForm++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, SelectModelElements Data - Creates a Revit element selection input for UI.MultipleInputForm++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos!, SelectPointsOnFace data - Creates a UI.MultipleInputForm++ input that allows point on face selection , Set Active Family Parameter By Name - Set a parameter inside an active family document, SetCropRegion - Sets the crop region of a view to a closed polycurve., SharedParameters from txt file - Gets parameters from SharedParameter .txt file, SheetTitleblock - Get the TitleBlock family type from a sheet, Sheet_Titleblock - Gets the titleblock used in a Sheet, SlabShape.AddPoints - Add points to slab shape, SlabShape.AddSplitLine - Adds split lines to Revit Floors, Slider - Creates slider input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Set the step to decimal value if you want a double slider, or to a integer value if you want an integer slider. , SplineChart - SplineChart, TextBox Data - Create Data for TextBox input in UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more informations, TextNote Data - Create Data for TextNote input in UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more informations, Transform.OriginAndVectors - Gets origin and vetorx of Autodesk.Revit.DB.Transform objects, TreeView input - Create a TreeView input for UI.MultipleInputForm ++ . Check out www.data-shapes.net for more infos and tips!, View.ViewRange - Returns the view range data of a view, ViewLevel - gets the level that a view is associated to, ViewportLocation++ - Gets the location point of a viewport or a ScheduleSheetInstance, ViewSection.ByLine - Create ViewSections in current document from DS Lines. , ViewTemplate.IsApplied - Returns a boolean value indicating wether a ViewTemplate is applied to any view in the project or not. This won't work for 3D templates. , WallSweepOnWall - Creates a wallsweep or reveal on a wall
